db:section.db:title: Synopsis
db:section.db:para: If versionless commands are disabled, use qt6_add_android_permission() instead. It supports the same set of arguments as this command.

db:section.db:title: Description
db:section.db:para: The command adds an Android permission to the target executable. This can be used to define additional permissions, or overriding the default permissions set by Qt modules.
For further information on defining Android permissions, see Qt Permissions and Features.
